targets.query: SELECT last("workers") / max("workers") FROM "six_month"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware' AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "workerType"

SELECT (mean("workers") - mean("quarantined")) AS "workers" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware' AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType" fill(previous)
SELECT sum("missing") AS "missing" FROM "six_month"."systemcheck" WHERE ("host" =~ /^t-linux/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m)
SELECT sum("missing") AS "missing" FROM "six_month"."systemcheck" WHERE ("host" !~ /^t-linux/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m)
SELECT sum("missing") AS "missing" FROM "six_month"."systemcheck" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "chassis", "cart", "workerId"

SELECT (max("workers") - max("quarantined")) AS "workers" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware' AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "workerType" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue", mean("running") AS "active", (mean("workers") - mean("quarantined")) AS "workers", mean("quarantined") AS "quarantined" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType" fill(none)

SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType", "host", "dataCenter" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType", "dataCenter"

SELECT count("mean") FROM (SELECT mean("running") FROM "procstat_lookup" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dataCenter", "workerType", "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "dataCenter", "workerType" fill(null)

SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dataCenter", "workerType", "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "dataCenter", "workerType" fill(null)
SELECT count("mean") FROM (SELECT mean("hung") FROM "systemcheck" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "chassis", "id" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "chassis" fill(null)

panels.description: Sum of events for hostnames over the last 4 weeks.
panels.title: repeat no-ping/hung

panels.description: Sum of hung for each chassis.
panels.title: chassis total no-ping/hung

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId = 'releng-hardware'
list.name: workerType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId = 'releng-hardware'
